revised_title: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London - June 21, 1888
tldr: This issue of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London from June 21, 1888, includes reports from Mining Registrars, a series of pamphlets on Education, Sanitation, and Local Government, and other publications of the Institute. The issue highlights various scientific and societal topics of interest during that time.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Education and Society
